meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: The tyrosines in the protein help with muscle growth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study tyrosines to understand their role in the body.
meanings.sent3: The tyrosines in the protein had a party and invited all the other amino acids.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of tyrosines was as sharp as a chef's knife.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the tyrosines made them stand out in the protein structure.

meanings.sent1: Many tyrosines were present in the sample for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The researchers discussed the significance of these tyrosines in their study.
meanings.sent3: The tyrosines gathered together for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The tyrosines shone like stars in the vast universe of amino acids.
meanings.sent5: The jar was filled with tyrosines, each one unique in its own way.
